title: Ep44: Sex Toys, Toe-F*king And Justice Feat Michelle Hope
itunes:title: Ep44: Sex Toys, Toe-F*king And Justice Feat Michelle Hope
description:
Mandii and Weezy are joined by Sexpert and sex educator Michelle Hope. The conversation starts off with a read to one of the listeners after Weezy felt very emotional to a response to a former guest. The conversation continues with yet another wild kink: Toe F*cking. Finally, the trio delve into the topic of sex toys, sharing specific toys that can be used for masturbation or in the bedroom with your partner. Are you confident with bringing toys into the bed? Song: Marvin Sease- Candylicker Follow us on Instagram @whoreible_decisions Mandii @Fullcourtpumps Weezy @WeezyWTF Guest information: Michelle Hope Instagram/Twitter @MHsexpert www.MHsexpert.com Support us! Become a Patron and receive bonus content every month and full video to this episode at Patreon.com/Whoreibledecisions
